body:
Comment 1: 
Which version of OS X? X11?

I just ran it under
  OS X 10.5.8
  XQuartz 2.1.6 (xorg-server 1.4.2-apple33)

and it worked as expected.

I opened X11, from the xterm I built the above program and executed it. A window
appeared briefly and the program exited.

bash-3.2$ env | grep ^X
XTERM_SHELL=/bin/bash
XTERM_LOCALE=C
XTERM_VERSION=X.Org 6.8.99.903(241)
X11_PREFS_DOMAIN=org.x.X11

The contents of ~/.Xauthority include my hostname and a binary string.

By most accounts, the X11 implementation supplied with OS X is pretty bad. The must be
some problem with your environment. (re-open this bug if you can get someone to
reproduce it on another system.)
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
